website_summaries.verdict: Simple style of dog training collar made for those just starting with obedience training.
pros: Style of nylon collar that can be used both as an everyday collar and as a beginner-level obedience collar
Offered in multiple sizes and colors
Offers reflective stitching in the material for use at night
Made more for puppies and light pullers rather than for those that need heavy corrections
cons: Has a plastic quick-release buckle, so it's not as sturdy as some others

customer_reviews.title: The BEST Collar and Leash
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased two collars and three leases from EzyDog. They are so well made. The martingale collar is perfect for controlling our GSD when she sees a squirrel while walking. It stops her from bolting, and she cannot escape from her collar. We do not use metal choke collars on any of our dogs. The width of the collar is perfect. She loves to swim, so the collar has been exposed to water and washed several times and it's still looks great (no fading or fraying). I wash the collar and leash in a lingerie wash bag and air dry. Love EzyDog's products.
customer_reviews.author: W

customer_reviews.title: Great Martingale-Style Collar`
customer_reviews.text: I really like martingale-style collars. They allow for a looser day-to-day fit without the risk of the dog slipping out in an attempt to chase a squirrel on a walk. ;) I also like that it works well for leash training when it's higher up on their neck. I bought two of these, one to replace my dogs current one that has just gotten old and dingy, and one for our new 9 month old puppy. They are made really well and the colors are vibrant! Great product.
customer_reviews.author: wenderzen

customer_reviews.title: High quality collar
customer_reviews.text: This collar checks all the boxes. First of all, it's martingale style, but it doesn't tighten too much.It has a quick release buckle, which is not common on these collars but is essential for safety. My dog is young and mischievous,and I need to be able to release the collar if he gets caught on something or during play with another pup. The collar and hardware are of superior quality, and are the right width and weight for a medium dog. My only concern was the length of the collar which seemed on the short side. Fortunately, it fit my dog at its longest possible adjustment, because the next size sounded too long.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Buy It, you won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. The collar gives a nice check and releases quickly to give my pup the guidance it needs, WITHOUT being rough. Easy slide for it slides back quickly after correction. By far the best design and quick action martingale I have ever used. Well made and am impressed by the material and slide action. Advice Fits well around the neck of my Aussie pup. Please not a collar for training should fit around neck, where the mom dog would check her own pup to train. You don’t have your dog wear a martingale too low. Never crate a dog with any type of training collar. In fact never crate your dog with a collar.
customer_reviews.author: Karwyn

customer_reviews.title: Said it was chewproof. Dog chewed it off in less than 10 seconds of looking away.
customer_reviews.text: I normally don't write negative reviews, but almost lost my dog due to this items failure. She was a rescue, timid, and hates being restrained. She has came a LONG way, but still chews when she is bored or anxious. Within 10 seconds of us being outside, and opening my car door to put my dogs inside, my dog had chewed off her collar and was running down the street. After 20-30 minutes of slowly tailing her, I was able to retrieve her with no harm done, thank God. Be warned, this is not chew proof.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent collar.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to write a review after using this collar for awhile.........We've had this collar for 3 months for our very energetic 2 year old, rescue cattledog/border collie mix, Dixie Doodle. She's on the beach almost everyday, in and out of the salt water, sand,rolling in dead fish, etc. The collar still looks brand new. Most of the other collars we've gotten use cheap metal, this one uses a high grade stainless, no rust whatsoever. it hasn't faded, the stitching is perfect. If your looking for this type of collar, look no further. BTW Dixie is 45 pounds, 16" neck, the medium fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne R.

customer_reviews.title: Very stiff, but the quick clip is nice.
customer_reviews.text: The quick fastening clip is great, however there is a rubber/plastic branding patch that makes part of the collar very stiff. A martingale collar should be very flexible and responsive. Maybe that’s the price of having a quick clip. I ordered a medium for my corgi and I feel that it’s a little too rugged for his size (30lbs).
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Rojas

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't loosen on own
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this collar except that after it tightens, it does not slip back into a loosened state on its own. Especially with a retractable leash, this collar does not work well. It keeps the collar in a constant tightened state. Even after I give extra slack I have to walk over and loosen the collar. The part that is supposed to slip is so straight and stiff it doesn't slide. The clip is great. It buckles on and off easily. But I'm afraid it is constantly too tight.
customer_reviews.author: Ric S.

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Super nice material, very very soft. I'm not a big fan of the giant label right on the working piece though, and I feel that it gets in the way. Surely the two other labels on the clip would suffice? For that, I am docking a star. Otherwise, I really like it! Wish they had this collar in a lime green though.
customer_reviews.author: onyxignite

customer_reviews.title: Just doesn't work for the intended purpose
customer_reviews.text: Unlike a prong collar, there is basically no reaction from the dog when I pull up of the leash. It looks better to the general public, who think the other type of collar is cruel, but having a well behaved dog is more important to me than how things look to those who don't know better. Plus, the smaller sizes (I bought a medium) are too narrow, which is possibly why mine doesn't work well. Three stars are for the color selections. More choices that any other collar. Nice!
customer_reviews.author: Jill F.

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE EZYDOG Products.
customer_reviews.text: I had to quibble with myself over 4 star or 5 star, because all in all this is a great product. My only comment would be that if you are expecting it to act like a martingale chain collar, it just isn't going to give you that "quick" release of tension as a chain would so it would probably not be the best for training purposes. However, all in all it is of high quality and I love the color.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Sherry G

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, great features
customer_reviews.text: This martingale-style collar was exactly what I needed for my dog! My furry friend is large with floppy ears, and he hated it when I pulled his collar off. With this collar all I have to do is unbuckle. My dog loves swimming, and the collar looks like new after many months of use, getting it wet, on and off several times per week.
customer_reviews.author: iShopper

customer_reviews.title: Nice collar, but not as good as the Martingale for my dog Wyatt
customer_reviews.text: I got this collar hoping to replace the martingale collar I've been using for the past 4 years. No go, my dog is so used to the martingale he doesnt respond to the Checkmate. I have to go back to the one that works, and am hoping to trade this one in for the Neo.
customer_reviews.author: FrazierDave

customer_reviews.title: This is great as he can wear it all the time
customer_reviews.text: Second ezy collar for my rescue boxer/pit bull mix. This is great as he can wear it all the time, but also tightens just enough so that on walks I don’t have to worry about him being able to “back out of” his collar when he over-enthusiastically wants to meet someone.... btw - the first one is still fine , I just decided to get him a new one ( he’s kind of a dandy...)
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Quality collar, not reliable for smart dogs
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this collar, easy to take on and off and well made. Unfortunately the way the martingale style works it also is really loose when my dog isn't pulling. I have a GSD mutt and she learned really quickly if she slowly backed out of the collar it would almost come off. Into the donation pile this one goes! Seems like it would work well on dogs constantly pulling, I'm not risking it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Training Aid
customer_reviews.text: High quality product with good adjustability. Martingale collars are such an important training aid for dogs learning whether they can sneak out of a collar. This doesn't act as a corrective choke collar (and it shouldn't!), It just keeps the dog from pulling backwards out of its collar. The material is sturdy and the pattern is fun. Only giving 4 stars because the style of martingale caught my puppies skin a few times as it was drawing tighter. He didn't seem to notice, but I have seen some red lines from skin catching.
customer_reviews.author: Nick and Mikaela Tunell

customer_reviews.title: Love this collar
customer_reviews.text: Love this collar! I have ordered a number of them both for our Chow Chow and Akita dogs. The easy clip feature is wonderful so there is no fussing over a traditional "belt style" prong-and-hole type fastener. Our male Akita is 3 years old, 80 lbs. and still pulls hard sometimes during a walk so having the "choker" feature to help train him not to do so is terrific. Had to order a replacement because he broke the clasp while chasing after a rabbit one day while tethered by cable to our truck when we were camping! Pretty sure that was a fluke as these collars are not cheaply made. Still very pleased with the overall performance of this collar.
customer_reviews.author: Lori O.

customer_reviews.title: buckle broke and my dog got loose
customer_reviews.text: the buckle broke and my dog got loose!!!! NOT GOOD. THANK GOD HE DIDN'T GET HIT BY A CAR!!!!! On the other hand the collar is great, not a traditional negative reinforcement choker, with praise and a lot of walks and training treats it 110% helped with his leash training!!!! Going to a metal/stainless buckle would be Ideal if the manufacture is reading these reviews. The effectiveness is why I am giving two stars instead of one!
customer_reviews.author: Colin W.

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting, great quality, good value
customer_reviews.text: I bought one 5 years ago for one of my dogs who I had difficulty finding a collar that would fit his neck but not slip over his head. EZ dog collar was perfect as it adjusts as needed without being a choking style martingale collar. It has held up very well. I just bought another for my other dog. Very good quality collar. Would highly recommend this collar
customer_reviews.author: Online Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, great function!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this collar to replace an old chain martingale collar I had. the chain type is always so heavy and when the lead is attached, the lead would rotate under the neck head and my dog would always get tangled up in the lead. I don't have this problem with this collar at all. It is lightweight, well made, and I love that there is a separate tag ring. Having the buckle is an added bonus. I will buy this collar over and over again!
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, feels good, the dog doesn't seem to mnd it
customer_reviews.text: A very nice collar that is secure and sturdy. My Standard Poodle doesn't look uncomfortable at all those times he ventures out too far and pulls the lead and the gradual pull from the limited slip is enough to get his mind back on me before he hits the end. It also looks stunning on him, so that's a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and value.
customer_reviews.text: We love the EzyDog Checkmate Martingale collar! Strong, Safe, reflective and as soon as you release tension, the collar gives slack so the dog understands each correction. Beautiful and not irritating to my dogs neck. The last (non-EzyDog) martingale was very irritating to his tender skin due to a less than optimal design. In the second photo Denso is also wearing the EzyDog harness (which is a nice handle when I need to control his urge to jump.) Thanks for the speedy delivery too!🐶❤️
customer_reviews.author: Joe and Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Allows a looser fit when off leash-great for neck rubs !
customer_reviews.text: I really like this collar. It allows me to have the collar loose and comfortable in the house, then snugged up when on the leash. I've had no problems so far with the dog pulling out of it, and honestly don't expect to. The collar looks well made & designed.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed😞
customer_reviews.text: This collar works great. Kept her collar tight when she wanted to run off. However can no longer use bc she chewed it almost into just after a month of the purchase so it apparently is not “rugged” as noted in product description. Is it possible to get a replacement?
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: I have been very happy with the days of collar that I purchased
customer_reviews.text: I have been very happy with the days of collar that I purchased. I have a 100+ lb. German shepherd, who can be difficult at times to take for a walk. This collar has given me better control of him. It checks him when needed, without hurting him. I recommend it to dog owners with large dogs.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: You will not EVER need another collar!
customer_reviews.text: Works as described! EzyDog has great products. I also purchased the "Zero Shock" absorbing leash with 'Traffic Control'. I have a Great Dane. So 'The 'Check Mate collar is THE alternative, if you do not subscribe to the "choker chain". No jerk as with standard leashes and works great in "traffic". The results are dead on, just as described by the manufacturer. Combine the 'The Check Mate' collar and the 'Zero Shock collar w/'Traffic Control' and that will be the last collar you purchase! Just "fit it and forget it!" Kudos, EzyDog! They have become my go to for all things dog for my Great Dane.
customer_reviews.author: John Ferrazza

customer_reviews.title: okay- if your dog is black or dark brown
customer_reviews.text: okay, so it functions. It is stiff and i have been working on making it a little more....supple. and it has improved, but it still is not great and stays at the tighter positions unless you manually loosen it. Worst thing- DO NOT get it wet while it is on your dog, if your dog is any color other than black! This thing bleeds like crazy and does not stop. It has been washed and dried 5 times and it still turns my dogs neck bright Orange.
customer_reviews.author: livinthedream

customer_reviews.title: Give it a try!
customer_reviews.text: For us, this product is a replacement for the half-choke collar with chain that we had been using. We love it! It does basically the same thing, but better. And it's lighter than the chain models. Give it a try. Plus we suspected a nickel allergy to the old chain that seems to have been resolved as well. Win-win!
customer_reviews.author: More M

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY Recommend EzyDog
customer_reviews.text: EzyDog is by far one the of the top producers of pet products like collars, leashes and harnesses. The quality is very high, the design is more efficient and user friendly (especially their harnesses.. some brands are tricky to figure out, EzyDog is simple as 1, 2, 3)
customer_reviews.author: T. Farrell

customer_reviews.title: Quality Dog Collar
customer_reviews.text: I like this collar so much that it is the second one I've purchased for the same dog. The first collar (orange) faded. This time I've bought a black collar. The strength and quality of this collar is far superior to others I've seen.
customer_reviews.author: chellesdogs

customer_reviews.title: Very good training collar.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, i like this style vs. Traditional chain style, seems to be a little more efective. smoother, and quite also. I'm a little wiry about plastic snaps because i have a mastiff, but seems to be of great quality time will tell, as of rite now im very satisfied wit this collar, i will be using it alot.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle perry

customer_reviews.title: Better than a true Martingale.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic colar. As its description says, it is a Martingale-style collar. So you're not getting the real thing, but I like this collar much better. When pulled, it does tighten around their neck, but not as much as a Martingale. It's great for Samoyed. I don't want to damage her fur. And best of all, it is well made. You won't waste the extra pennies buying this collar.
customer_reviews.author: Eckmoose

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this collar!
customer_reviews.text: Love this collar! Less pressure than the chain collar but still gets the job done! Will never own a different collar! I use this collar on both of my Pitbulls.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Ballard

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome!! Durable, high quality materials. I've had my martingale collar for over two years and it looks brand new. The harnesses for small dogs are also great. Recommended to many friends. The martingale is a fantastic option for a dog that pulls lightly. My Great Dane wears one and I've used it on other medium to large breeds as well. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jaylynn

customer_reviews.title: Superb quality and design!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Best designed martingale collar without any chain links. Martingale action is smooth and incorporates tougher webbing where needed. Comfortable for your dog and easy to click on and off with the buckle. Love the small tag ring and high quality webbing too!
customer_reviews.author: jojo from montreal

customer_reviews.title: Quality collar
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love that this collar has a buckle release. My biggest concern of using martingale collars was if a dog got caught in the collar while playing and choked You get the control of a martingale collar with the safety feature of the buckle. I bought one for each of m dogs!
customer_reviews.author: sharon green

customer_reviews.title: helps control my stubborn dog
customer_reviews.text: My 100 lb Labrador is a puller, she is very stubborn and if she sees or smells something she likes you better hold on tight. I have tried numerous collars and harnesses to help control her, but this has been most beneficial to date. She still pulls some, but not nearly as much and not as bad. She typically stays in heel position and responds to my "check" when she starts to pull. Collar is also holding up well so far
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Extremely good product.
customer_reviews.text: I like this collar a lot, my service dog can wear this 24 seven and there is no stress on his neck. The D ring is very durable and I like the fact that when connected the collar will tighten as necessary preventing slippage.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A Ming

customer_reviews.title: Second one and would replace it with another one!
customer_reviews.text: Our local shelter sends all dogs home with this type of collar. We liked it so much that after Zeke had outgrown his "shelter" collar, we replaced it with a new EZY dog one. Too bad there aren't more "boutique" colors and patterns, like Lupine, our previous favorite! Highly recommend it for dogs of all ages.
customer_reviews.author: cherie warber

customer_reviews.title: Second one, dog chewed through original one.
customer_reviews.text: Dog chewed through the collar. Otherwise, I liked the collar. Only using it once in a while, seems to cut his coat a little also.
customer_reviews.author: Avak

customer_reviews.title: GREAT QUALITY DOG COLLAR!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered medium for my almost 2 month old Akita whose 25lbs and it fit him perfectly! Quality is great, very sturdy and strong material. I recently ordered a Large size because he's now 44lbs.and medium is now too thin on the neck even if it still fits him and I can still adjust to make it longer, there's more room but it's just too thin now, it's time for a ONE INCH THICK collar as he grows.
customer_reviews.author: AMZN Product Reviews  ✅Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Durable and High Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a great collar. I have two of these now. One we use when we tether our dog outside and the other one for walks/hikes. It's really high quality and is really less prone to scuffing. Not sure that's the right word but cheaper leashes/collars that are made of this nylon material start to fuzz up and look really crappy but not this collar here. Would definitely recommend for people looking for a collar that will last long.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Great collar
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and works like martingale collar should. Easy to put on and very well built. Ask the dog to get his collar and this is always his choice ( and yes I’ve hidden it deep in the bin with others on top, but still brings it).
customer_reviews.author: Canadian Eh!

customer_reviews.title: Best collar!
customer_reviews.text: I love all their products. Easy on and off, soft on dogs neck to prevent rubbing...quality, sturdy...great product.
customer_reviews.author: E. Murry

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is sturdy, almost impossible to slip out of on walks..we do not leave him on it chained up but he needs a drag line so we can stop him from chasing deer into the woods etc. He has been wearing it for several months and it still looks and works like new.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Van Sickle

customer_reviews.title: Turned exhausting walks with my dog into pleasant strolls with little effort.
customer_reviews.text: A dog trainer recommended this collar for my 10 month old Goldendoodle to help with excessive pulling when on walks. I was a little skeptical that it would make much of a difference, but boy was I wrong! From the very first walk using this collar, I have seen amazing results with very little effort on my part. She has learned to adjust her pace instead of me pulling her back. I so wish I had purchased this months ago!
customer_reviews.author: Norma Green

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Our local Labrador rescue group uses these, so when we became a "foster fail" we bought one for our newly adopted puppy. E
customer_reviews.author: Avid Mystery Reader

customer_reviews.title: Game changer!
customer_reviews.text: Our dog trainer recommended this for our 30 pound doodle mix 4 month old puppy, and it is a game changer! She can’t lunge like she wants, but the collar loosens when she walks at a normal pace. This collar is a miracle along with the shock absorbing collar. We will get a larger version when she grows out of it. Walks are so much easier now!
customer_reviews.author: amandajoyous

customer_reviews.title: I've tried different Martigale collars and I love this one so that I bought a second when ...
customer_reviews.text: I've tried different Martigale collars and I love this one so that I bought a second when my puppy grew out of his first one. Training a very large and headstrong GSD is much easier with this collar. It tightens when he pulls too hard, but then quickly releases when he falls back in step. It's very well made, and has stood up to rough playing with other dogs without fraying; something the previous collars haven't done. I'll be buying a third if/when he grows out of this one.
customer_reviews.author: Patti P.

customer_reviews.title: Good fit for my dog with a massive neck.
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased to find a collar that would fit my Rottweiler. He has a massive neck and even the local pet stores only had the buckle like a belt type collar in his neck size. I do not like those buckles and prefer this type of closure so I am very happy with it. I also like the style so he has a choke type collar if needed without it being one of those chains or prong collars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works good on my Mals
customer_reviews.text: I needed a nice collar my mals couldn't slip out of --- these worked very good and are holding up the powerful mals.
customer_reviews.author: Carol M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice collar, Great company & service
customer_reviews.text: This collar it a great alternative to the traditional chain collars and it fits better than the martingale collars with a tightening chain. It does have a tendency to slide down my dog's neck, which is annoying, but no different than every other collar we've tried. By freak accident, my dog broke the buckle and the company quickly responded, apologized and sent a new replacement collar. While the collar malfunctioned, it was too nice of a collar to not try again and the company really stands behind their product.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: I love Martingale collars because they stay plenty loose unless the ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog, Spur, looks stunning in this collar. I love Martingale collars because they stay plenty loose unless the dog pulls hard on the leash and then they tighten up. Works great for dogs who can back out of collars. I put Martingale collars on all of my foster dogs since I don't know which ones fight the leash and which ones don't.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah944

customer_reviews.title: Well made collar
customer_reviews.text: Walking two dogs, one a puller, we needed something to control while teaching the newest adoptee to respect the lease without choking her down or pinching to get attention. This is a martingale - same function as a horse martingale is to the reins of a bridle, hold and release, it slips easily and tightens and releases easily. I've tried a "come along" on bigger dogs that were not nearly as effective. The collar itself is of good appearance, well constructed with strong buckles, ring for tags and leash and will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Omnivorous Reader

customer_reviews.title: My dog is a very hard to walk spaniel who is not yet two but he had a serious operation so for now I am not using the ezy dog harness which I also like.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one the first is orange and I just needed an extra one in case it is misplaced washed etc.My dog is a very hard to walk spaniel who is not yet two but he had a serious operation so for now I am not using the ezy dog harness which I also like .
customer_reviews.author: summer birthday

customer_reviews.title: great design idea
customer_reviews.text: great design idea. I am not a fan of the metal choke collars and this is perfect for walking pullers. fits perfectly but my "to smart for his own good" dog has figured out how to make it larger so he can take it off (over his head!!).
customer_reviews.author: Kerri Moore

customer_reviews.title: Nice collar and idea but....
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice collar and I like the idea of the snap instead of just putting it over my dogs head like all other martingale collars. The one and only issue I have is when it tightens the metal clasp turns sideways and kinks causing it not to release without intervention. My dog pulls and it goes from loose to tight and the only way to make it loose again it by playing with it. It is actually very difficult sometimes. If this can be fixed it would be the best martingale collar out there.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Beto

customer_reviews.title: Fits comfortably and slip proof
customer_reviews.text: We found this collar the best fit for our GSD. This puppy could slip out of any other style we had. It proved comfortable on her and reliable for training. Very glad we found this . We had to purchase a second one, I made the mistake of leaving the first one near her while grooming, forgot to put it back on. She chewed on it for quite awhile, only part of the buckle got ruined. Ordered the same asap! Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Perfect collar.
customer_reviews.text: We love this collar, and still use it. We bought it when our puppy was around 6 months old and it adjusts easily as she grew. It’s soft to touch and super sturdy. The clasp has worked perfectly, easy to undo, but always holds up even when taking off to chase poodles at the park. Great color, great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Justin S

customer_reviews.title: Love the color of this martingale collar!
customer_reviews.text: We use martingale collars for our very spunky pup who tries to get out of her collar all the time. This camo theme is so much cuter than the plain solid colors found in our local pet shops. Appears to be nice quality and the buckle works easily yet appears strong when it locks into place. Happy with the purchase. Just bought the matching leash!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah J.

customer_reviews.title: My Newfie loves her collar
customer_reviews.text: She sits and wait for it to be put on. Very easy to use and comfortable for my Newfie's neck.
customer_reviews.author: James Stiefel

customer_reviews.title: Made in USA
customer_reviews.text: This is the second collar I've bought for my growing girl. The first still looks new, going on 4 years old but my dog has gotten the more mature look & needed the next size up. It seems to be comfortable for her & like the first one, it is top quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Great training collar!
customer_reviews.text: Works well with our 4 month old puppy. She has begun to act better when taking short walks in the backyard and listening to commands since using this collar. It is very easy to take on and off and is very durable. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Charlene

customer_reviews.title: My favorite collar brand
customer_reviews.text: My favorite collar brand, esp for Martingale style. Looks great, durable, and does its job right. I've owned three of these now (it's not that they don't last, I'm just too lazy to wash them, but also our dog grew).
customer_reviews.author: ACY89

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: We had a bit of trouble with our dog getting out of his previous collar, but this one absolutely keeps him secure (so much so that I took him on a walk recently with just this and no harness). Works great and seems to be of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Great collars
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good collar. Works great. My dog doesn't pull now and the collar doesn't choke like a chain . I recommend it. Good quality too.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W. Regrut

customer_reviews.title: this collar is amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: this collar is amazing!!! we have a bigger 65lb bully breed mix and it's perfect for him. it doesn't hurt him, but it helps get his attention to remind him to listen to us :)
customer_reviews.author: absnevitt

customer_reviews.title: Works as it shoud.
customer_reviews.text: Works great but he material is a little on the stiff side.
customer_reviews.author: J R

customer_reviews.title: Product is really good. Build quality is very good and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Product is really good. Build quality is very good and sturdy. Giving it 3 stars as it did not stop my pup from leash pulling.
customer_reviews.author: Amrapali C.

customer_reviews.title: The Best dog collar I've found
customer_reviews.text: The Best dog collar I've found, finally able to use something other than a chain collar for my large dogs, great design, great materials, small enough to quickly put on and remove before your dog can snatch it from you, literally a perfect product.
customer_reviews.author: Giovanni G

customer_reviews.title: Broke!
customer_reviews.text: Return date for product was Feb 3; today is Feb 7 and collar broke today!!! Good collar except for "plastic" connector. Yep, that's what broke. Coyote crossing in our yard, my dobeman lunged and plastic broke. Coyote led my pup to the road, I'm lucky she didn't get run over. I would not recommend for strong dogs and will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Lamkins

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great collar I unfortunately didn't get to bring the dog we were adopting home so no longer need collar at this time maybe down the road!!
customer_reviews.author: Cambria Holcomb

customer_reviews.title: bought for 2 dogs - fine for smaller one...
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these collars in the same size. One was for a 29 lb dog and the other was for a 65 lb dog. Works OK on the smaller dog, but there is not enough play in the collar to adequately control the larger dog. In any case, they are much better than using a choker collar!
customer_reviews.author: Peter Lima

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for about a month and half and my dog went after another dog and the collar literally snapped in half. So very disappointed. Not at all trustworthy. Would like a full refund asap
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn V.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: This is my second check mate collar and we love it. They work great as long as your pay attention to which side you are walking your dog on and adjust accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: BINCA

customer_reviews.title: I have a 3 year old white German shepered a ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a 3 year old white German shepered a mb d I was totally dissatisfied with this collar it was strong everywhere else except in one spot. Where it clips together (plastic) The dog gave it one strong pull and he was free because the clip broke.
customer_reviews.author: will115

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This excellent quality training collar has a reflective area which is great in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Not the quality I'm used to with ezydog
customer_reviews.text: The material seems very cheap and its very thin for a large dog collar. It also does not match the shade of blue that's on the ezydog harness (but I am not basing any of my review on that). Other than that it's ok but the material is too flimsy and thin for my large dog so I think I'll be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Mich

customer_reviews.title: Gentle trainer
customer_reviews.text: The collar is excellent for training my Great Pyrenees. He is about 11months old and is sensitive fellow.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: The color was great, just what I wanted (orange). The only reason that I gave it 4 stars on quality of material was because the stickers (name of the company) had slide off slightly. I put them back on, and it looks fine now. Overall, great product.
customer_reviews.author: JDSimon17

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: So far appears to be holding up well and it expanded large enough to comfortably fit my English mastiff. So yeah, I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: M. LEAL

customer_reviews.title: very good collar
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good collar. This is my second one because the first one was faded from years of exposure to the sun. A dog trainer was impressed with it so she got one for her dog. Fits loose, tightens as the dog pulls, but doesn't choke.
customer_reviews.author: zumodog

customer_reviews.title: Almost killed my dog
customer_reviews.text: Ive had this collar for several months now and thought it was the best collar Ive ever purchased. Because of the ability to adjust the slack, my 5 month old Dachshund got this caught around the bottom part of her mouth and eventually it made its way into the back part of her mouth. Thank god I was home and it was only there for a few minutes. I dont even want to think what could of happened if no one was home for several hours.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Bertram

customer_reviews.title: the plastic snap will break in about a year.
customer_reviews.text: decent collar, but the plastic snap will break in about a year. Obviously it will break at the wrong time
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: If you're looking for a martingale style collar, this is a good buy. You'll be happy.
customer_reviews.text: Love this collar. Reasonably priced for the quality! Got two of them for my boxers. Durable and well made. Also love the extra loop for tags and how it is opposite the loop for the leash. Allows me to easily clip their tags on and off with a small carabiner when I go to dogs parks or other places where tags are needed. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Reese

customer_reviews.title: Moshe lives it (comfortable, takes signals well — stop, go).
customer_reviews.text: Moshe loves it! He is a service dog and we use his new collar often. It’s sensitive to my signals to him (stop, go mosyly).
customer_reviews.author: BigdaddyGeo

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and wearing collar
customer_reviews.text: We love this collar! We use it on our four dogs and we're on our 3rd set (they do fade after a year or two of wear and tear.) It comes in a variety of colors and has a separate tab for attaching their tags. It is the only collar we will use from now on.
customer_reviews.author: C. Melville

customer_reviews.title: I love that it has the buckle
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for a more drastic difference with walking my puller of a lab, but I definitely see an improvement. I love that it has the buckle, because it would be a royal pain taking a normal martingale on and off with how much my lab loves neck scratches. The quality is awesome, and I love that it has the separate ID loop.
customer_reviews.author: Krystina

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy and so is Charlie!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent collar and both my husband and I like the quality, ease of putting on and the improvement in our dog walks. I will be purchasing one more for our other dog Matilda!
customer_reviews.author: Ralford

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality collar. Sizes run a bit small - I have 2 Australian Shepards and got mediums - one about doesn't fit. It would be a better product if the D-ring on the Martingale was centered to allow it to loosen back up after a tug. But no complaints on stitching or buckle. . Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Crissy Evans

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It does not choke my dog just tightens enough to get there attention
customer_reviews.author: debi

customer_reviews.title: Fits nicely and works well
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Washes up well. Meant to walk dog on your right side. Put on up side down to walk dog on your left side. 2/1/2018 Ordered second one for extra. I really like this collar.
customer_reviews.author: rlplus

customer_reviews.title: This was recommended by a dog trainer
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended by a dog trainer. It does help quite a bit in getting my dog's attention while practicing obedience, especially new moves.
customer_reviews.author: K. Shepler

customer_reviews.title: Great width for larger dogs
customer_reviews.text: Nice wide collar. Comfortable for the dogs and martingale slides easy to avoid slip lease.
customer_reviews.author: Hiney

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: Like it, well made and functional, not as bulky as other collars
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I love these collars!. My rat terrier’s head is smaller than her neck and she can easily back out of a regular collar. These are great. This is my third one. ( they are all still good - just different colors)
customer_reviews.author: k a goyette

customer_reviews.title: Didn't get what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: What is shown on the website is a collar. Twice (once an order, once a replacement) I got a harness.
customer_reviews.author: K. Toole

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed that it broke in less than a year
customer_reviews.text: I was generally satisfied with this collar until it broke last week. One of the plastic buckle prongs just snapped off while my dog was wearing it. Fortunately she didn't run off! Had it less than a year.
customer_reviews.author: Peter B

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to a chain type martingale collar
customer_reviews.text: This is our second one, love it and both have held up great
customer_reviews.author: SBraun

customer_reviews.title: What a surprise, finally found the one for my pup
customer_reviews.text: Sleek design. Very durable. Must buy if you're looking for the right M collar.
customer_reviews.author: Keyuan Zhou

product_meta.title: EzyDog Checkmate Martingale-Style Training and Correction Dog Collar
product_meta.description: Size:Large| Color:RedThe EzyDog checkmate collar is a martingale-style correction collar that does not require the act of re-sizing for each fitting. So with all the time you just saved, you can spend it correcting your pup's unwanted behavior while on a leash. Just give a tug and the low profile nylon collar with reflective stitching, and it will cinch up to let him know that you're checking. (do not leave the collar on your pup unattended.)
feature_bullets: MARTINGALE-STYLE CORRECTION TRAINING COLLAR: Our martingale style collars are safer and more comfortable than choke collars for more control over your dog without the choking effect of a slip collar to reduce the risk of a dog pulling out of the collar and escaping.

UNIQUE DESIGN RESPONDS WITH EACH TUG: Our unique cinching-design martingale collars tighten securely when your dog pulls or you apply a gentle tug. They feature quick-clip buckles for fast and easy on and off, and rust-proof D-ring for safety and security for daily walks.

LOW-PROFILE NYLON COLLAR WITH REFLECTIVE STITCHING: The low-profile Checkmate collar is comfortable, lightweight, and rugged, and the highly reflective woven-in threads provide greater visibility and improved night safety.

CHECKMATE COLLARS REQUIRE NO RESIZING: Unlike traditional Martingale collars, our Checkmate collars are easy to fit and do not require re-sizing for each fitting and our easy-to-use quick-clip buckles provide fast on and off.
SELECT THE BEST SIZE: Based on your dog's NECK measurement. If you are close to the end of a size, bump up to the next size: Neck (Inches): SM 10”-13”, MD 13”-18”, LG 17”-26”, XL 22”-33”
